article.title: March 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The March 2013 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • GCC2013 early registration, and oral presentation and poster abstract submission are now open, and we have several new sponsors!
  • The March 20 GalaxyAdmins meetup will feature Hailiang (Leon) Mei, and David van Enckevort speaking on NBIC Galaxy at SURFsara's HPC cloud
  • A new public Galaxy server in Costa Rica
  • New papers
  • Open Positions at four different institutions
  • Other Upcoming Events and Deadlines
  • Galaxy Distributions
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the April Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
